findings.message: The plan requires `PolicyFeeClarityPanel` and `LocationInline` to remain correct after reorder, but TASK-02's automated test scope only asserts perks-before-rooms order; no explicit regression assertion is planned for those two components, so this acceptance condition can silently regress.
The summary anchors to exact source line numbers (`225`/`239`), which are volatile and can become stale quickly; keep file/element references as primary evidence in future updates.
